content.question: For time <math alttext="t is greater than or equal to 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>t</mi><mo>≥</mo><mn>0</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>, the acceleration of a particle moving along the <math alttext="x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>-axis is given by <math alttext="a, of t, equals, 12 times e raised to the negative 2, t power, plus 18 t" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>a</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>t</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>12</mn><msup><mrow><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow><mi>t</mi></mrow></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>18</mn><mi>t</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>. At time <math alttext="t equals 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>t</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>, the velocity of the particle is 2 and the position of the particle is 4. What is the position of the particle at time <math alttext="t equals 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>t</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> ?

choices.label: <math alttext="negative 6 times e raised to the negative 4 power, plus 44" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>6</mn></mrow><msup><mrow><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>44</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="3 times e raised to the negative 4 power, plus 24" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>3</mn><msup><mrow><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>24</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="3 times e raised to the negative 4 power, plus 41" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>3</mn><msup><mrow><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>41</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="12 times e raised to the negative 4 power, minus 4" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>12</mn><msup><mrow><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="3 times e raised to the negative 4 power, plus 41" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>3</mn><msup><mrow><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>41</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>

topic.text: 8.2: Connecting Position, Velocity, and Acceleration Functions Using Integrals

skill.text: Skill 1.D: Identify an appropriate mathematical rule or procedure based on the relationship between concepts (e.g., rate of change and accumulation) or processes (e.g., differentiation and its inverse process, anti-differentiation) to solve problems.
